title: Q5 - How does DPDPA apply to educational institutions handling minors’ data?
description: The Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) applies fully to schools, colleges, and educational platforms that collect, store, or process students’ personal data, especially when those students are under 18 years of age.
